answers.answer: Mark Hayman in his book "The Blood Sugar Solution" talks a lot about this.

Prof Richard Johnson from univ of Colorado talks about this too.  Check out his book Fat Switch, and youtube videos.  He did a great talk recently in New Zealand discussing latest research in this area.

question: AMP-activated protein kinase, a metabolic master switch: possible roles in Type 2 diabeteshttp://ajpendo.physiology.org/content/277/1/E1
title: AMP-activated protein kinase possible roles in Type 2 diabetes
